main event: A civilian couple observed several bright lights in the sky near Terre Haute, Indiana and Chicago Heights, Illinois in July 1952.
interesting points: The couple saw two yellow lights moving in a straight line from east to west at a low elevation on July 7, 1952., Another couple sighted several bright lights that changed course abruptly and moved rapidly for about 15 minutes on July 22, 1952., The couple in Chicago Heights reported that the lights did not appear to be aircraft and emitted no sound., There were multiple credible witnesses in both sightings, and no evidence was found to discredit their observations., These sightings were part of a larger investigation under Project Blue Book, which documented numerous UFO sightings during the same period.
sighted object: two yellow lights and several bright lights
location: Terre Haute, Indiana and Chicago Heights, Illinois, USA
witness description: a civilian couple observed the lights
